# [Interview #212: Robert Jordan's Blog: ONE MORE TIME, Entry #13](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=212#13)

#### Robert Jordan

For Anonymous, you can send plot related questions to me through my publisher, but I don't often answer those.
